name: Bowling Push Pro
description:
Bowling Push Pro is a very interesting and realistic bowling game. It has really fantastic rendering and realistic physical simulation which can simulate real environment in a bowling alley. The game is also quite easy to play. Just slide your fingers on the screen to push the ball and try to hit down as many bottles as you can.
Game Features:
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Well baked scene
- Carefully designed user interface
- Commercial physics engine for real pin and ball action
